title: It is compulsory to obtain technical sanction from the same authority which is competent for the technical sanction of other civil projects run through the Planning Authority
clause_text: It is compulsory to obtain technical sanction from the same authority which is competent for the technical sanction of other civil projects run through the Planning Authority.
section: Construction Amenity TDR in Sq.m. = A / B * (2) 1.35 Where,
